plot outline: Retiro Station, Buenos Aires, year 2002. In the middle of a drizzle, three boys try to watch the opening of the FIFA World Cup through the window of a pizza place, but they are chased out. The Argentina-Nigeria match is in a couple of days. Upon returning to the slum where they live in, the boys make a strange pact: when the time comes, they will watch the game on TV, either together or separately, at any costs. From that moment on, each of them will try to follow the pact with different consequences.
title: Slum
production companies: Laboratorio Argentino de Cine Sociedad Anónima
plot: During the 2002 FIFA World Cup, three poor boys from Buenos Aires will put their lives on the line just to watch one of the national team's matches.

Retiro Station, Buenos Aires, year 2002. In the middle of a drizzle, three boys try to watch the opening of the FIFA World Cup through the window of a pizza place, but they are chased out. The Argentina-Nigeria match is in a couple of days. Upon returning to the slum where they live in, the boys make a strange pact: when the time comes, they will watch the game on TV, either together or separately, at any costs. From that moment on, each of them will try to follow the pact with different consequences.::Sebastian Incaurgarat
